name: Chiroform ABS Gymball 75 cm.
descr:
Chiroform ABS Gymballs is for all traditional kinds of treatment using a ball, physiotherapy, chiropractic, back exercises, prenatal care and convalescence exercises, pelvic exercises (incontinence, geriatric gymnastics) etc.

The Chiroform ABS Gymballs are made of a burst resistant material that will slowly deflate if punctured. Weight tested up to 500 kg.

Available with private logo upon your request by order of larger quantities.
